strapiPost.title: AcreTrader Makes List Of World's Most Innovative Companies
strapiPost.content:
Locally-based investment group AcreTrader has been ranked number two in the Personal Finance sector of Fast Company's annual list of the World's Most Innovative Companies for 2023.

  • Farmstrong: Founded in 2018, AcreTrader raised over $80m in venture capital to increase access to investments in farmland and connect expanding farmers with the capital necessary to grow their businesses.
  • Sowing broadly: AcreTrader has helped thousands of investors across the US and Australia invest in over 40,000 acres of farmland and distributed millions to investors in annual income from farm investments as of Dec 2022.

Read more about AcreTrader in Arkansas Money & Politics HERE.
